Name: Titus the Fox
About the game: Join Titus the Fox in his hilarious adventure 'To Marrakech and Back'. On foot, riding a skateboard or flying your magic carpet, you set off across the Sahara to free your kidnapped love - Foxy! You encounter many enemies such as Babyboon, the kid with the deadly bottle, and Toyo, the spectacled snake. This mega-game has been hailed by critics as the reference for Jump'n'Runs in the computer games world. Platform game of exceptional size: More than 900 screens on 15 levels with 54 extraordinary enemies. Secret rooms, hidden bonuses, and deadly traps. Unique system of interaction: player - enemies - objects - backgrounds. Options: level codes, continue, adjustable 8-way scrolling.
